feed.title: Bitcoin at POS using BIP70, NFC and offline payments - implementer feedback

entry.title: Bitcoin at POS using BIP70, NFC and offline payments - implementer feedback
entry.summary: In a conversation regarding the usage of ECDHE, it was suggested that it cannot be used in every situation. The person asking for clarification believed that it could be used in all situations, but the response clarified that it is actually a fixed session key in the URI that cannot be used in every situation. No further information or context was provided.
